title: Is there anyway to play in english on the LAN server?
body: I live in Miami and my native language is English but I wanted to switch over for that juicy low ping. Anyone have any idea how to switch the language to English over on LAN?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, [LAN only supports Spanish](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language). You may be able to make a manual change, but it's not a change we officially support.

Let me know if you have any questions.
